channel.title: Disconnecting all time. Help please
channel.description:
I run my server. All is ok untill everybody get disconnected of my server and then they can't get on it. This can happend when ever. I'm tired of that. So when they disconnect, they try to log on but it says "Error Connecting To Server" but on Status Checker, it says "Online" all time even if people can't get on.
Can anyone help me please ? :(
Thanks.

item.title: Disconnecting all time. Help please
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I run my server. All is ok untill everybody get disconnected of my server and then they can’t get on it. This can happend when ever. I’m tired of that. So when they disconnect, they try to log on but it says “Error Connecting To Server” but on Status Checker, it says “Online” all time even if people can’t get on.

Can anyone help me please ?

Thanks.
